name: Pro Tools Eleven Rack Plugin Preset File

description: Eleven Rack is guitar recording and effects processing system developed by Digidesign (now Avid) in 2009. It can be used on its own or with Avid Pro Tools software. The TFX file allows you to save and share settings that can be imported into Pro Tools with Eleven Rack.
To save a TFX file, open the Eleven Rack window in Pro Tools and choose the "SAVE" dropdown menu. You can then choose "Save to Computer" or "Save All Rigs to Computer."
To load a TFX file, open the Elven Rack window in Pro Tools, click the preset name, choose "Select Load from Computer" from the dropdown menu, and select the TFX preset.
